name: Virtual Pool 4 Multiplayer
description: Play 8-Ball, 9-Ball, Snooker, Billiards, Pub Pool, 27 games total!“So realistic it will make your real life pool game better!”Compete in tournaments or play with friends. Player profile, statistics, calendar, shot upload, tournaments, lobby with chat. Grab a cue and play now!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Pentium 1.6 Ghz Graphics: Intel or AMD HD Graphics or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1200 MB available space Sound Card: Sound Blaster Compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Athlon II (K10) 2.8 GHz or higher Graphics: NVidia GTS 250 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Sound Blaster Compatible

reviews.review_text: It's a launcher to buy the game for 30$.  Plus it's even a terrible ♥♥♥♥♥♥ launcher...

Good Game  The Best simulation game for Pool /Snooker /Billiards. The free version only lets you play in the Garage-room on a barbox (small)table 6 or 9ball or 8 ball us-rules, its alot of fun.  But, if you want to be able to play every game available, I recommend buying the Full VP4 game because you'll be able to play offline as well, great for practice! It includes 1 year full online play.
Lol the game simply doesnt run...
